description: A performance flannel made to travel anywhere, this combines classic style and comfort with smart features and technical fabrics. The Ren plaid is rugged casual, and the ultra-soft ThermoCore yarns add warmth and quick-dry performance. Stretch fibers up your freedom and hold the fit, and deep zippered pockets secure your travel docs and smartphone.
name: Royal Robbins Thermotech Ren Plaid LS - Mens
